Package com.example.fairdraw.Adapters

Class EntrantNotificationAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EntrantNotificationAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.fairdraw.Adapters.EntrantNotificationAdapter
public class EntrantNotificationAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EntrantNotificationAdapter.ViewHolder>
Adapter for displaying entrant notifications in a RecyclerView.

Supports multiple notification view types (WIN, LOSE, WAITLIST, REPLACE) and maps them to different item layouts. The adapter exposes an EntrantNotificationAdapter.OnAction callback interface for handling user actions such as accepting/declining a win and item clicks.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    EntrantNotificationAdapter.OnAction
    Callback interface used by the host to respond to user actions in the list.
    static class 
    EntrantNotificationAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder that lazily locates the message and CTA text views used by different notification layouts.
